name: Bondie Metchore Web Design
description:
My Goal is to help entrepreneurs and small business owners have a strong online presence with a website that is one of a kind, affordable, professional and most importantly that will represent them, their brand and their vision.
I specialize on WordPress websites and blogs, which offer a wide variety of tools for small business owners to make the most out of their website, I also provide SEO analysis of your current website and I can optimize your WP site with the right plugins to make sure that your are positively noticed by Google and that your website is right there in front of your target clients, where it should be!
